channel.title: CNET
channel.description: The latest tech news, product reviews, videos, and how tos from CNET.

item.title: Beirut explosion: How ammonium nitrate caused deadly blast in Lebanon - CNET
item.description: A large stockpile of ammonium nitrate is believed to have caused the explosion in the Port of Beirut.
item.dc:creator: Jackson Ryan

item.title: The console wars are over now that Xbox Game Pass includes xCloud video - CNET
item.description: Microsoft, Sony and Nintendo have been locked in a decades-long battle for console domination...but the war may be over now that Xbox is focusing on Game Pass and xCloud game streaming instead of a traditional console life cycle. But who won?
item.dc:creator: Ashley Esqueda

item.title: Are the second stimulus check qualifications the same as the first? How they could change - CNET
item.description: With the stimulus bill debate in its second week in Washington, Speaker Nancy Pelosi is looking at no deal this week and we have questions. Could more people in your household meet the requirements for the second stimulus check, or fewer? Here's the status of qualifications.
item.dc:creator: Clifford Colby

item.title: 5 discounted Switch games to buy now on Nintendo's eShop - CNET
item.description: Doom, Pokken Tournament DX and more.
item.dc:creator: Daniel Van Boom

item.title: Ex-Google engineer sentenced to 18 months in prison for trade secret theft - CNET
item.description: The engineer, Anthony Levandowski, was at the center of a bitter legal battle between Google and Uber.
item.dc:creator: Richard Nieva

item.title: Watch JFK discuss Rick and Morty in deepfake - CNET
item.description: The former president begins his 1963 civil rights address with: "Wubba Lubba dub dub."
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Bisset

item.title: Samsung Unpacked: How to watch the Galaxy Z Fold 2, Note 20 announcement tomorrow - CNET
item.description: It takes place virtually on Aug. 5.
item.dc:creator: Patrick Holland

item.title: SpaceX Starship prototype takes big step toward Mars with first tiny 'hop' - CNET
item.description: It looks like a floating tin can, but the test article known as SN5 may really be providing a glimpse of the future.
item.dc:creator: Eric Mack

item.title: The Boys season 2: New trailer, cast, plot and release date - CNET
item.description: See the latest trailers for Amazon's dysfunctional superhero series, The Boys. Catch up on everything you need to know before season 2 starts Sept. 4.
item.dc:creator: Bonnie Burton

item.title: Australia has invented Shazam for spiders - CNET
item.description: And it's about damn time.
item.dc:creator: Mark Serrels

item.title: Is it time to report yet? Follow these steps and tell the IRS your stimulus payment never arrived - CNET
item.description: The details of the second stimulus check are still being negotiated by Washington lawmakers. If you're still waiting for your first one, here's how to let the federal agency know about your absent money.
item.dc:creator: Clifford Colby

item.title: The best Wi-Fi range extender for just about everybody - CNET
item.description: Does it matter which one you use? Turns out, yes it does.
item.dc:creator: Ry Crist

item.title: Best smart speaker of 2020: Echo Dot, Nest Mini and more - CNET
item.description: Smart speakers are here to stay. These are the best ones you can buy, no matter which voice assistant you prefer.

item.title: The best smart home products to buy this summer - CNET
item.description: Find the latest smart home products for your backyard.

item.title: Kodak gets $765M loan from US to produce medicines, reportedly including hydroxychloroquine - CNET
item.description: Kodak Pharmaceuticals will produce key components for drugs.

item.title: Mulan on Disney Plus: 'Exciting, vibrant, emotional' - CNET
item.description: "If there was any CG used it was invisible." Now that Mulan will be released on Disney Plus on Sept. 4, here are some of the reactions from movie critics who saw it in March.

item.title: The best VPN service for 2020 - CNET
item.description: A virtual private network lets you send and receive data while remaining anonymous and secure online.

item.title: 15 of the best movies to watch on Amazon Prime Video - CNET
item.description: Amazon has loads of gems for you to watch. Let's round them up.

item.title: Phil Schiller no longer Apple's head of marketing video - CNET
item.description: Longtime Apple executive Phil Schiller becomes an Apple Fellow, with Greg Joswiak taking over the head marketing job.

item.description: Amazon has a bunch of great shows. Here are some of the best.

item.title: Indian's big bikes get Apple CarPlay integration for 2020 - Roadshow
item.description: The Challenger, Chieftain and Roadmaster all get the update, hopefully with more models to follow.

item.title: Disney Plus: Everything to know about Disney's streaming service - CNET
item.description: Mulan will be released on Disney Plus on Sept. 4 for an extra $30, but big questions hang over the fates of its Marvel live-action series. Here's everything to know.
item.dc:creator: Joan E. Solsman
